<sky>.name: Sky
<sky>.info: A charming actor with a youthful vibe, he balances playful charisma with subtle emotional depth. His expressive gestures add charm to every public appearance.

<jae>.name: Jae
<jae>.info: Known for his commanding presence and mature charm, he often takes on pivotal, emotionally complex roles. His sharp gaze adds weight to every performance.

<park>.name: Park
<park>.info: An elegant actress with a modern and poised style, she brings sophistication to her roles. Her calm gaze and confident stance show her composure and strength.

<wook>.name: Wook
<wook>.info: He gives off a composed and intellectual aura, often seen in professional or office settings. His subtle smile and clean-cut appearance suggest quiet confidence and thoughtfulness.
